name: Redefining IT Pvt Ltd
description: Redefining IT Pvt. Ltd. is a proficient
overview: Redefining IT Pvt. Ltd. (RITPL) is an ISO 9001:2008 and Microsoft BizSpark Certified, one of the rising Web and Application Development Company operating from New Delhi. RITPL provides cutting edge solutions to the clienteles spread in India, USA, UK and Australia. Our team consists of Web Designers, Web Developers, System Analysts, Business Development, and Search Engine Optimizers. RITPL was founded by Jeetin Ghai, a 10 year veteran of the web and interactive space. Jeetin Ghai has worked for some of Delhi & NCR’s renowned web agencies. He founded Redefining IT Pvt. Ltd. in 2009 with the idea of providing web & application development services by redefining the IT processes and at the same time keeping the overheads low. RITPL is providing custom and quality of applications development services with latest and emerging Web Technologies. RITPL encourages its visitors to outsource their Web Design, Application Development and SEO projects to us and get the best Return on Investment. Our result oriented team will work closely with you to meet your business objectives. With this, we also provide extensive client support ensure that you and your customers are satisfied with the product developed by RITPL.
